ComicInfo.Title: The Ladies Line; Raisin' Pie; Maple Valley Public Library; Starting Over
ComicInfo.Summary:
Darla overhears the conversation of a woman she considers a friend.
An illustrated version of a 1916 poem extolling the virtues of raisin pie.
Friendly Librarian Nora helps out and takes a complaint about a book a visitor considers obscene.
Tommy Cottonwood is released from jail, but has learned nothing, and Doofus is searching for Henry Hotchkiss.
Rick and Ariel consider their forthcoming move to Providence and their new joint comic.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:00:45. [Issue ID 733680]
